refnamediv.refpurpose: output CMS_ContentInfo structure in BER format.

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int i2d_CMS_bio_stream(BIO *out, CMS_ContentInfo *cms, BIO *data, int flags);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: i2d_CMS_bio_stream() outputs a CMS_ContentInfo structure in BER format.
It is otherwise identical to the function SMIME_write_CMS().

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: This function is effectively a version of the i2d_CMS_bio() supporting streaming.

refsection.title: BUGS
refsection.para: The prefix "i2d" is arguably wrong because the function outputs BER format.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: i2d_CMS_bio_stream() returns 1 for success or 0 for failure.
